name: cru_pre_yearly_mean
title: Yearly Mean Precipication - CRU TS
description: Yearly mean precipitation from Climate Research Unit (CRU) in millimeters. Version 4.01
details: Created by aggregating (mean) monthly precipitation data from CRU TS

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation value per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Harris, I. , Jones, P. , Osborn, T. and Lister, D. (2014), Updated high‐resolution grids of monthly climatic observations – the CRU TS3.10 Dataset. Int. J. Climatol., 34: 623-642. doi:10.1002/joc.3711
